Night is sleep time! How many of us agree? 

Hmmm. There are some of us who are restless at night. We can't seem to go to sleep.

Animals also sleep. Some sleep during the night. Some sleep during the day. Like dogs.

Some animals sleep for six months in a year. Like bears. 

Our little friend Tinku is a cute little puppy. Like all dogs he does not feel sleepy at night. 

This is a story of a night of adventure for Tinku.

So what does he do? Let's find out if he finally goes to sleep that night.
